channel.title: Talking Disabled? Rep++
channel.description: So I posted this in the Server Help section. Then, I found out that this was a client sided issue, so I'm posting it here also. In tutorial island, I guess talking is disabled? It's almost like everybody is muted. I don't know, I've never heard of that but I have no idea on how to approach enabling it. Anyone have any ideas? I will rep.

item.title: Talking Disabled? Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Devinhdl Devinhdl
item.description:
@Devinhdl wrote:

So I posted this in the Server Help section. Then, I found out that this was a client sided issue, so I’m posting it here also.
In tutorial island, I guess talking is disabled? It’s almost like everybody is muted. I don’t know, I’ve never heard of that but I have no idea on how to approach enabling it. Anyone have any ideas? I will rep.

Read full topic
